poem:
Title: The Shimmering Silk of Deception

A collusion of shadows, the Iranian dealer's tune,
To the beat of a Canadian biker in the noon.
Another man designed as the unseen third,
In the deadly dance of a plot absurd.
Oceans away, intelligence weaves,
A labyrinth of lies that deceives.
Yet, as plainly as ink on a page,
We find in chaos, life's endless stage.
